content: fugly monster version 9 - axel shredmane axel shredmane is a nod to the heyday of 80 s hairmetal 5mm hook worsted weight yarn in eight colors skin shirt pants boots inner mouth hair & guitar body/neck dk or thinner in white for teeth fabric for headband - strip of bandana etc or crochet one long enough optional - earrings necklace belt w/button buckle worked in the round - top down unless otherwise noted head/skin color - 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 7-15 single_crochet around 9r of 36 16 single_crochet 2 chain 10 skip 10 single_crochet 24 36 17 single_crochet around 36 18 decrease single_crochet 4 around 30 stop here - eyes between rounds 11 & 12 above ends of mouth nose centered one round below eyes inner mouth 1 chain 13 tuen single_crochet 12 2-4 chain 1 turn single_crochet 12 - fo leave long tail sew over mouth hole on inside of head teeth - 3 5mm hook sport weight or dk - make 4 1 chain 4 turn slip_stitch 3 chain 1 turn slip_stitch 3 chain 1 turn slip_stitch 3 - fo leave tail sew onto inner mouth continue with main pattern - 19 decrease single_crochet 3 around 24 stuff head 20 single_crochet around 24 switch to shirt color on last st - do not fo but tie short ends together on inside 21 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 22-36 single_crochet around 15r of 30 switch to pants color on last st - do not fo but tie short ends together on inside 37 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 38-42 single_crochet around 5r of 36 stuff body stop here - find middle back st should be about 6st back move st marker to this st it now becomes the first single_crochet in round one of leg one 43 counting from st marker make enough single_crochet to get 18 44 work across body - single_crochet into first st and next 17 18 45-52 single_crochet around 8r of 18 switch to boot color on last st - do not fo but tie short ends together on inside 53-56 single_crochet around 4r of 18 57 decrease single_crochet 4 around 15 58 decrease single_crochet 3 around 12 59 decrease around 6 fo close hole - stuff leg add more stuffing to body leg two - attach with slip_stitch to first free st on front middle 1 chain 1 single_crochet into same st and next 17 18 2 work across body into 1st single_crochet & next 17 18 3-10 single_crochet around 8r of 18 switch to boot color on last st 11-14 single_crochet around 4r of 18 15 decrease single_crochet 4 around 15 16 decrease single_crochet 3 around 12 17 decrease around 6 fo close hole - stuff leg and rest of body through hole between legs close hole tuck ends into body arms - make
